phone-accessory.name: UltraShield Tempered Glass Screen Protector
phone-accessory.description: Crystal-clear 9H hardness tempered glass with 2.5D rounded edges and anti-fingerprint coating for scratch and drop protection.

phone-accessory.name: PowerMax 10000mAh Fast-Charging Power Bank
phone-accessory.description: Compact 10000 mAh power bank with dual USB-C & USB-A ports, supporting 18 W fast input/output charging.

phone-accessory.name: AirWave 10W Wireless Charging Pad
phone-accessory.description: Qi-certified charging pad with LED indicator and non-slip rubber surface—delivers up to 10 W fast wireless charging.

phone-accessory.name: GripMate Magnetic Phone Grip
phone-accessory.description: Collapsible magnetic grip/stand compatible with MagSafe—enhances one-handed use and doubles as kickstand.

phone-accessory.name: ClipCam 3‑in‑1 Lens Kit
phone-accessory.description: Universal clip-on kit featuring macro, wide-angle, and fisheye lenses—comes with hard case and cleaning cloth.

phone-accessory.name: PhotoTrip Mini Tripod with Ring Light
phone-accessory.description: Flexible mini tripod for mobile photo/video, plus detachable adjustable-brightness ring light—great for creators :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}.
